description:
We are currently engaged with a high-growth private aviation company. This luxury business with a strive for safety has experienced significant growth and is currently searching for a sales leader to drive engagement across their sales organization.

They are searching for a driven and people focused sales leader who can maximize the organizations revenue through the development of new sales strategies. Reporting directly into the President of the organization, you will have the opportunity to collaborate across the business and drive a clear impact as the organization continues to grow.

Essential Functions
Take charge of the organizations revenue through various revenue streams
Develop and execute the companys sales strategy to drive revenue growth and increase market shares
Set sales targets, quotas, and performance goals for the sales team, and provide ongoing coaching and feedback to ensure objectives are met.
Lead the sales team in prospecting, identifying, and closing new business opportunities.
Build and maintain strong relationships with key clients and stakeholders, and identify opportunities to expand existing accounts.
Monitor market trends and competitive landscape to identify potential business opportunities or threats, and adjusting sales strategies accordingly.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams, such as marketing and product development, to align sales efforts with overall business objectives
10+ years experience in a senior sales management role, preferably within a similar industry.
Proven track record in achieving and exceeding aviation sales targets, and a strong understanding of aviation products, services, and market dynamics.
Strong track record of achieving sales targets and driving revenue growth.
Ability to travel 50%
Bachelors degree in business, marketing or a related field. MBA preferred
